quest.name: On Ehll Tou's Wings
journal: Hautdilong has something to share with you, and he can't hold it in any longer.

dialogue.name: HAUTDLONG
dialogue.text: MissSir Surname, there you are! Ehll Tou and I have been thinking of how we can repay you for all your help.

dialogue.name: HAUTDLONG
dialogue.text: After much deliberation, we decided to ask Master Arvide to help us craft a bespoke item, just for you. I hope he hasn't spoiled the surprise.

dialogue.name: HAUTDLONG
dialogue.text: When last we spoke, he said that the project was nearing completion. Perhaps he is finished by now? Oh, I do hope you like it!

dialogue.name: HAUTDLONG
dialogue.text: I think you'll be pleasantly surprised by what Ehll Tou and I have devised for you. Master Arvide should have it ready by nowâ”€he should be at the market in the New Nest.

dialogue.name: ARVIDE
dialogue.text: Ah, welcome! I take it you've spoken to Hautdilong, then. Well, here you go!

dialogue.name: ARVIDE
dialogue.text: Ehll Tou was most insistent I designed this horn just so. Blow on it and the little dragon will fly to your side wheresoever you may be.

dialogue.name: ARVIDE
dialogue.text: Although I suppose I can't call her little any more, eh? 'Tis only natural that as she grows, her desire to see more of the world would grow as well.

dialogue.name: ARVIDE
dialogue.text: That's why she wanted you to have this. Show her every corner of the civilized world, and introduce her to people of all sort. She'll need a wide breadth of knowledge if she means to paint her kin the full picture of our kind.

dialogue.name: ARVIDE
dialogue.text: When I first agreed to help Ehll Tou, I had no inkling I might be contributing to something much larger than myself. Whatever comes of her efforts in the end, I must say I'm honored to have played my small part in it. Thanks for giving me this opportunity, friend.
